rules_text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards named Against the Waves in your graveyard. Draw a card, then conjure three cards named Against the Waves and shuffle them into your main library.
flavor_text:
[i]“His struggle meant nothing to the ocean.”
—Azamir, “Far From Home”[/i]
notes:
fluffy: merged paragraphs and phrases (failed inspection), -dashgap, 2>two 
!script "<s><l>Conjure three Against the Waves</l><f>/spawnx3 Against the Waves Reminder 101</f></s>","r"
 !token Against the Waves Reminder<3><conjure>
!spellbook Against the Waves;3
